items.title: Hoelang blijft Ten Hag een technisch directeur?
items.summary: In de nieuwe VI ZSM gaan Sander Janssen en Jarno Verweij dieper in op de aanstelling van Erik ten Hag als technisch directeur van FC Twente. Verder bespreken de heren ook een aantal wintertransfers en de opmerkelijke speelwijze van Liam Rosenior, de nieuwe manager van Chelsea.

items.title: Kassa voor voetbalmakelaars: 2025 was een uiterst lucratief jaar
items.summary: 2025 was een recordjaar voor declarerende zaakwaarnemers. Dat heeft de FIFA becijferd. Clubs betaalde 1,16 miljard euro aan tussenpersonen die bemiddelen bij transfers. Dat was een toename van negentig procent ten opzichte van 2024.

items.title: FC Groningen: een enorm compliment en een belangrijk verbeterpunt
items.summary: Na een relatief korte winterstop gaat vrijdag de Eredivisie weer verder. Tot diep in maart is er elk weekeinde een speelronde. Met andere woorden: het cruciale deel van het seizoen gaat beginnen. In deze serie maken we bij elke club de balans op, waarbij we wat betreft de volgorde uitgaan van de eerste speelronde van 2026. Deze keer: FC Groningen.

items.title: Jones continues winning streak with incredible comeback win in Auckland
items.summary: Fran Jones followed up her career-best win over Emma Navarro by reaching the quarter-finals of the ASB Classic in Auckland.

items.title: Sources: United approach Carrick, Solskjaer
items.summary: Manchester United have held "early-stage informal talks" with several potential interim managers, including Ole Gunnar Solskjaer and Michael Carrick, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Messi deelt toekomstplannen: 'Ik zie mezelf niet als een trainer'
items.summary: Lionel Messi (38) verwacht niet dat hij na zijn actieve carri√®re het trainersvak in zal gaan. De achtvoudig Ballon d'Or-winnaar, die bij Inter Miami nog een contract heeft tot medio 2028, ziet meer heil in een rol als clubeigenaar.

items.title: Dit is het schema van de kwartfinale van de Afrika Cup
items.summary: De achtste finales van de Afrika Cup zitten erop, wat betekent dat het tijd is voor de kwartfinales. Na twee rustdagen gaat het toernooi vrijdag verder. We zetten de wedstrijden op een rij.

items.title: England‚Äôs Katie Robinson poised for shock move from Aston Villa to Bristol City
items.summary: WSL2 side beat off competition for winger‚Äôs signature She started career at City and has been on loan at Everton The England winger Katie Robinson is poised to complete a shock move from Aston Villa to Bristol City, the Guardian understands, as the Women‚Äôs Super League 2 club make a significant signal of their ambition. The 23-year-old, who made her England debut in 2022, has ‚Äì according to sources ‚Äì completed a medical to return to the club where she started her career before establishing herself at Brighton. Robinson has five caps and was the youngest member of England‚Äôs squad at the 2023 World Cup, where they reached the final. Bristol City have fought off competition for her signature. Continue reading...

items.title: Why Liam Rosenior‚Äôs time at Strasbourg was ideal preparation for Chelsea
items.summary: The 41-year-old is at home with young players and, crucially, he is familiar with the demands of Chelsea‚Äôs owners By Get French Football News Liam Rosenior looks up at the towering Strasbourg Kop. He shouts and pleads as he points to his players, demanding the fans applaud them. Met with hostility, boos and jeers in the stands, he cuts a lone figure, one at pains to sow unity at a divided club. Strasbourg had just won the game, beating Le Havre 1-0 earlier this season, but the club‚Äôs fans were in no mood to celebrate. Behind an image are a thousand words, or three banners in this case. One called for the club president Marc Keller to leave Strasbourg; another criticised the bizarre Ish√© Samuels-Smith back-and-forth transfer; and the one to which Rosenior took particular exception concerned his captain, Emmanuel Emegha. It read: ‚ÄúEmegha, pawn of BlueCo, after changing shirts, hand back your armband.‚Äù Emegha had agreed a deal to join Chelsea a few days earlier, once again confirming to Strasbourg fans that they were subservient to ‚Äúbig brother‚Äù Chelsea in the multi-club hierarchy. Continue reading...

items.title: No games, no league and now no City Football Group: Indian football faces up to ‚Äòglobal embarrassment‚Äô
items.summary: CFG have ditched Mumbai City and losing the glamour will hurt the game in the world‚Äôs most populated nation The world‚Äôs biggest multiclub network shrank from 13 to 12 in the last week of 2025 but few blame the City Football Group for walking away from Mumbai City and India after six years. The reason for divesting their shares which gave them 65% ownership was addressed, not that anyone needed enlightening in a statement. ‚ÄúCFG has made this decision after a comprehensive commercial review and in light of the ongoing uncertainty surrounding the future of the Indian Super League (ISL).‚Äù Uncertainty is an underestimation. The 2025-26 ISL season was supposed to kick off in September. However, with a 15-year Masters Right Agreement between the All India Football Federation (AIFF) and its commercial partner ending in December and no new agreement or partner in place, it never started. Most assumed that it would be a short-lived delay but here we are, in 2026, and there is still no football. A meeting took place in Delhi on Tuesday and produced a start date of 14 February, just six weeks short of a year since Mumbai‚Äôs last ISL game. How it works, if it works, remains to be seen. Continue reading...

items.title: TGL golf: Horschel delivers winning putt to keep Atlanta undefeated
items.summary: Billy Horschel drained the decisive putt to give Atlanta Drive GC their seventh consecutive victory in a 7-4 win over The Bay Golf Club on Tuesday.

items.title: Bethell hits sublime maiden Test ton to give England slim hope in Sydney
items.summary: Jacob Bethell scored a sublime maiden first-class century to give hope to an England fightback in the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney before a late wobble on the fourth evening left the tourists eight wickets down and with a lead of 119.
